effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to raise the user’s Defense one stage.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to raise the user’s Defense one stage.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to raise the user’s Defense one stage.

short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Has a 10% chance to raise the user’s Defense by one stage.
